title: Workshop on PMRI-Based Addition and Subtraction Concept Design for ADHD Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic arithmetic operations, general understanding of ADHD learning characteristics
context.additional_context: A job-integrated curriculum for science professionals, conducting project-based assessments in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can design addition and subtraction concept maps tailored to the cognitive characteristics of learners with ADHD using the PMRI (Progress Monitoring and Remediation Intervention) approach.
Learners can develop at least three types of concept explanation materials utilizing mathematical representations (pictorial, concrete, and symbolic).
Learners can create activity-based assessment tools to improve attention span in learners with ADHD.

resources: PMRI (Innovative Practical Mathematics Learning) Guidelines Document

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
